mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT_APPLICATION ( EVENT_CODE, STAT_CODE, APP_TITLE, APP_SUB_TITLE, APP_DETAIL, LOCATION, LOCATION_DETAIL, POST_CODE, WEBSITE, START_DATE, END_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, SUBMITTED_DATE, APP_FEE, APP_ITEM, APP_HOST, APP_ORG, APP_SPONSOR ) VALUES ( #{eventCode}, #{statCode}, #{appTitle}, #{appSubTitle}, #{appDetail}, #{location}, #{locationDetail}, #{postCode}, #{website}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, SYSDATE, #{appFee}, #{appItem}, #{appHost}, #{appOrg}, #{appSponsor} )
INSERT INTO APP_MANAGER ( APP_ID, MANAGER_NAME, EMAIL, TEL, FAX ) VALUES ( #{appId}, #{appManager.managerName}, #{appManager.email}, #{appManager.tel}, #{appManager.fax} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.APP_ID, B.MANAGER_NAME, B.EMAIL, B.TEL, B.FAX FROM EVENT_APPLICATION A LEFT JOIN APP_MANAGER B ON A.APP_ID = B.APP_ID WHERE A.APP_ID = #{appId}
